name: poly(3-nonyl-1,1-dioxo-1-thiopropane-1,3-diyl)-block-poly(x-oleyl-7-hydroxy-1,5-diiminooctane-1,8-diyl), process mixture with x = 1 and/or 5, neutralised with dodecylbenzenesulfonic acid
Restrictions: Only to be used as polymer production aid in polyethylene (PE), polypropylene (PP) and polystyrene (PS).
